txt.en: 'Bats that live in cave belong to Blight Lady. Not just pets, they carry her plagues and drop them on people she don't like. You don't want that to happen to your people....'
Plagued great-bats can be found in the Lair of the Gloom-lord.\n\nYou should defeat plagued great-bats.

You have slain many of Lhaereth's plague-carriers this day, which will surely slow down her deployment of the contagion, should she decide to release it. However, you know the true threat still awaits in Seregost.
'Bats that live in cave belong to Blight Lady. Not just pets, they carry her plagues and drop them on people she don't like. You don't want that to happen to your people...'
The Lair of the Gloom-lord houses many of Lhaereth's great-bats; her personal plague-carriers. You should take this opportunity to thin their numbers.
